response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $120 by myself. Given its high quality and unique features, it's worth more than $100 to you. Considering this, I would like to propose a fair deal at $110. This price not only ensures a good return for me but also allows you to acquire a valuable item at a reasonable cost. I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 110}
